document_data.name: Darwinn's Trading Post
document_data.services: Provisions, general goods, ''[[potions of healing]]'', ''[[potion of flying|potions of flying]]''
document_data.mainbody:
'''Darwinn's Trading Post''' was a general store and provisions shop found in [[Feather Falls (village)|Feather Falls]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. The owner, [[Darwinn]], set reasonable prices for his shop, having only a 10% markup.

In contrast to its modest services, Darwinn's also offered ''[[potions of healing]]'' and ''[[potion of flying|potions of flying]]'' for sale. His source for these magical items was unknown to the Dalesfolk of Feather Falls as Darwinn refused to share that particular piece of information.
